entry.title: Christmas Wishes Kimberly Shaw Tea in a Tea Cup Christmas Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.99

Outside text: "Wishing you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year".

Inside reads: "Wishing you and your family a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year".

Tea inside: Holiday Tea, a blend of ceylon tea spiced with citrus, almond, clove and cinnamon flavors from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Hollyhock Hello Kimberly Shaw Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Hollyhock card back by popular demand but with a bit of a change. This time to wish someone a hearty "Hello" while delivering a robust English Breakfast tea.

The front greeting with an old fashioned hollyhock doll says, "A Little Note," and finishes the sentiment inside with, "To Say Hello."

Tucked in the rim of the teacup is a bold English Breakfast black tea from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size measures 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: For My Sister Kimberly Shaw Greeting Card with Tea Included
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A greeting card with a gift of tea for your sister to enjoy.

Outside text: "For My Sister"

Inside reads: "I'm so lucky to have a wonderful sister who is also a terrific friend"

Tea inside: Jasmine, a fragrant green tea from Harney & Sons

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Poinsettia Teacup Christmas Music Sheet Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A classic poinsettia teacup delivers a warm Holiday tea in a traditional Christmas musical setting. The front music sheet is a hand-drawn illustration of Handel's, "Messiah," duet chorus Part 1, No.12 - For unto us a child is born.

The inside reads, "With Christmas carols ringing true, This gift of tea I send to you."

Tea inside: Holiday Tea a blend of Ceylon black tea, citrus, almond, clove, and cinnamon from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw White Daisies Get Well Soon Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A charming daisy teacup on a serving tray to deliver a soothing tea and get well wishes for a speedy recovery.

Inside reads, "Hope you feel better soon."

Tea inside: Lemon Herbal a soothing blend of lemon and herbs from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Pretty Pansies Thinking of You Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A teacup adorned with pansies, which represent thoughtfulness, make a thoughtful "Thinking of You" card. 

Outside text: "Thinking of You"

Inside is Blank with additional teacup artwork that looks lovely with a hand-written note. Add your own personal thoughts.

Tea inside: Paris Tea, a fruity black tea with Bergamont from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw You Are Loved Tea Greeting Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

It's always appropriate to tell someone they are loved and thought of.

Outside text: "You Are Loved"

Inside reads: "You are in my heart and thoughts today."

Tea inside: Raspberry Herbal from Harney & Sons Fine Teas

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Baby Shower Tea Invitation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99 - 117.00 (3 variants)

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Royal Tea Party Invitation
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99 - 117.00 (3 variants)

Meant to impress, there's a real tea bag in this Kimberly Shaw invitation.

Outside reads, "Please Join Us".

Inside: Fill in the blank style invitation text, see additional image.

Tea inside: Earl Grey Decaffeinated, from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card measures 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Girls Night Out Invitation Cards
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99 - 117.00 (3 variants)

For girls of all ages, there's a real tea bag in this invitation for your guests to enjoy in anticipation of your party.

Tea inside: Raspberry Herbal, a mixture of rosehips, hibiscus, and raspberry which brews to a warm pink. Yes, we had little girls' teaparties in mind! From Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Inside text: Fill in the blank style invitation text, see additional image.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: 12 Days of Christmas Kimberly Shaw Tea in a Tea Cup Christmas Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.99

A real tea bag in every card!
Envelope Included.

entry.title: Happy Holidays Kimberly Shaw Tea Bag Christmas Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.99

"Wishing you and your family a Happy Holiday Season"
A real tea bag in every card! Envelope Included.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Woodlands Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Stationery
Price: 3.99

Outside text: "A Merry Christmas"

Inside text: "Have a very merry Christmas, It's the best time of the year. With your home filled up with gladness, And your loved ones all drawn near. Merry Christmas."

Tea inside: Holiday Tea, a blend of ceylon tea spiced with citrus, almond, clove and cinnamon flavors from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Rose Thank You Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A charming teacup card with a vase of garden flowers to send your heart-felt thanks. Inside reads, "Thanks a bunch". Tea inside: Raspbery Herbal, a mixture of rosehips, hibiscus and raspberry leaves from Harney & Sons Fine Teas. Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and include a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Thank You Teapot Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Say "Thank You" with a tea set adorned with trailing roses. Inside reads, "Your thoughtfulness is greatly appreciated". Tea inside: Raspberry Herbal from Harney & Sons Fine Tea. Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Mother's Day Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A teacup card for your mother with a delicious tea bag tucked in.

Outside text: "Happy Mother's Day"

Inside reads: "For all the caring and thoughtful things, you have done for me, I'm wishing you a wonderful day, with a relaxing cup of tea. Happy Mother's Day."

Tea inside: Japanese Sencha, a nourishing green tea hand-picked in spring from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2 " and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Special Birthday Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Everyone's birthday is special, but what makes it perfect is a card from you acknowledging the event.

A yellow ribbon decorated with flowers begins your greeting with "Happy Birthday"

The inside reads, "For You on Your Special Day. Happy Birthday."

Tea inside is Orange Pekoe, a classic Assam and Ceylon blend from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size measures 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Happy Birthday Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

In all the festive birthday colors, "Happy Birthday" is inscribed on a pink scroll in front of a floral teacup.

The inside message reads, "Wishing You a Very Happy Birthday."

Tucked in the rim of the teacup is Paris Tea, a fruity black tea with bergamont, from Harney & Sons Fine Tea.

Card size measures 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Get Well Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Birds to offer tender care, with an Organic Green Tea for good health.

The message inscribed on the teacup reads, "Get Well."

The inside greeting reads, "Wishing you a speedy recovery."

Tea inside is a refreshing Organic Green Tea with Citrus & Ginkgofrom Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Cheery Birthday Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Pink Cherry blossoms cover this sweet teacup, with a cherry fruit tag that expresses your wishes for a "Happy Birthday."

The inside greeting reads: "Wishing you a bright and cheery birthday."

Tea inside is a very fruity Raspberry Tea, which brews to a pink hue, from Harney & Sons Fine Teas

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and comes with a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Birthday Tea Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A teal teacup with gold accents and a "Happy Birthday" greeting. Amatching plate with a pink center rose wraps around to the back of the card.

Inside reads, "A Gift of Tea From Me. Happy Birthday".

Tucked inside the rim of the teacup is a Refreshing Peppermint teafrom Harney & Sons Fine teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Birthday Letter Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A Swallow is sent to carry your Birthday greeting. The added bonus is a delicious tea for your recipient to enjoy.

Inside reads, "Sending You Happy Birthday Wishes".

Tucked inside the rim of the teacup is a fragrant Jasmine Green tea,from Harney & Sons Fine teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Birthday Greetings Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

When it's time to send warm Birthday greetings, two song birds are there to say, "Birthday Greetings" on the front of the card.

The inside message reads, "For you on your special day. Happy Birthday."

Tucked in the rim of the tea pot is a bold English Breakfast tea from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size measures 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw Bird of Paradise Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

Meant to impress, this teacup greeting card comes with its own delicious tea bag.

Blank inside for a personal note or greeting.

Tea inside: Hot Cinnamon Spice, a spicy black tea with cinnamon, orange peal, and cloves from Harney & Sons Fine Teas.

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2 " and includes a white envelope.

entry.title: Kimberly Shaw B is for Baby Tea Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kimberly Shaw
Type: Kimberly Shaw Tea Greeting Cards
Price: 3.99

A card for a mother or mother-to-be that comes with a gift of tea.

Outside text: "'B' for Baby"

Inside reads: "A new baby! How wonderful! Congratulations"

Tea inside: Organic Green Tea with Citrus and Ginkgo from Harney And Sons Fine Teas

Card size is 4 1/4" x 5 1/2" and includes a white envelope
